title: need help with getting started
content:
while looking around I came across this website

https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/what-every-software-engineer-should-know/

which guides you through the fundamentals of computer science with reference material 

I want to know if actually going through and studying all of that is worth it 
or
should I just get started with coding and not pay too much heed to the low level stuff

comments.body:
Google cs50x by Harvard and watch some lectures 
Then do the specific code course for C or python depending on your cycle. Either CS50P or CS50C
